title: Crime Alert 12.03.18
itunes:title: Crime Alert 12.03.18
description:
O.J. Simpson had ‘at least one accomplice’ in murder of Nicole Brown and Ron Goldman, ex-manager claims. Daycare employee suffocates baby girl because she wouldn’t take a nap. Drunk wedding photographer has sex with guest, pees on tree—then threatens to kill arresting officers’ kids.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
